attributes.action: Toll Free Travel for Widnes / Runcorn Residents on Jubilee Bridge when new mersey crossing opens
attributes.additional_details:
A new Bridge is to be built across the River Mersey, It will be a toll bridge, The existing Jubilee Bridge will also be a toll bridge. Many families are split between Runcorn and Widnes. The cost to keep in touch will be a worry to them.

The answer is to make the Jubilee Bridge toll free for residents of Widnes and Runcorn.
